database.name: VIEW EFIN_RDVTXNLINE_V
database.view: SELECT t1.efin_rdvtxnline_id AS efin_rdvtxnline_v_id, t1.ad_client_id, t1.ad_org_id, t1.isactive, t1.created, t1.createdby, t1.updated, t1.updatedby, t1.efin_rdvtxn_id, t1.efin_rdv_id, t1.match, t1.type, t1.eximatch_qty, t1.eximatch_amt, t1.match_qty, t1.match_amt, t1.match_date, t1.trxln_no, t1.trxapp_no, t1.m_product_id, t1.item_desc, t1.unit_price, t1.del_qty, t1.c_uom_id, t1.deliver_amt, t1.c_validcombination_id, t1.funds_available, t1.received_date, t1.c_bpartner_location_id, t1.comp_uom, t1.delay_uom, t1.completion_per, t1.payment_purpose, t1.inv_amt, t1.exipenalty_amt, t1.penalty_amt, t1.advamt_rem, t1.exiadv_deduct, t1.applicable_method, t1.adv_deduct, t1.total_deduct, t1.netmatch_amt, t1.invoice_status, t1.payment_status, t1.line_status, t1.c_invoice_id, t1.escm_initialreceipt_id, t1.c_orderline_id, t1.efin_parent_id, t1.issummary, t2.txn_version, t3.txn_version AS txn_version_prv, t3.efin_rdvtxn_id AS efin_rdvtxn_id_prv, t4.efin_rdvtxnline_id AS efin_rdvtxnline_prv, t1.m_product_category_id FROM efin_rdvtxnline t1 LEFT JOIN efin_rdvtxn t2 ON t1.efin_rdvtxn_id = t2.efin_rdvtxn_id LEFT JOIN efin_rdvtxn t3 ON t3.txn_version <= (t2.txn_version - 1) AND t2.efin_rdv_id = t3.efin_rdv_id LEFT JOIN efin_rdvtxnline t4 ON t3.efin_rdvtxn_id = t4.efin_rdvtxn_id AND t1.item_desc = t4.item_desc
